Medium: 15 etching and drypoints (5 with aquatint), printed in black on cream, smooth, wove Japan paper; two supplementary suites, printed in color: one (with additional etching and drypoint) on cream, smooth, wove Japan paper; and one on ivory, smooth, laid China paper; and 1 added unbound drawing
Dimensions:
irreg. page  9 15/16 x 7 1/2" (25 x 19 cm)
Prints: various dimensions.
Title: LES SEPT PÉCHÉS CAPITAUX
